title: The Arrow [1997] DVDrip Supersonic Canadian fighter (Dan Aykroyd
description:
True story of how Canada built one of the world's most advanced supersonic fighter planes, already back in the 1950s. When finished, the project was suddenly cancelled due to political changes.

This is the full 3 hours dramatized documentary with lots of interesting details about construction of airplanes and jet engines, including authentic historic footage. I had to order the DVD from Canada.

Good stereo sound, original fullscreen. DVDrip XviD 2-pass-
Burn tested, runs well in my divX player. <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0118641/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0118641/</a>
